refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the auto generated id from previously executed prepared statement.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
my_ulonglong mysql_stmt_insert_id
MYSQL_STMT * stmt
The &function.mysql_stmt_insert_id; function returns the ID generated by a prepared statement on a table with a column having the AUTO_INCREMENT attribute. If the last query wasn't an INSERT or UPDATE statement or if the modified table does not have a column with the AUTO_INCREMENT attribute, this function will return zero.
